database.description: Database number. Can be specified with the `REDISDB_DATABASE` environment variable. Defaults to `0`

hostname.description: Server hostname. Can be specified with the `REDISDB_HOSTNAME` environment variable. Defaults to `127.0.0.1`

port.description: Server port. Can be specified with the `REDISDB_PORT` environment variable. Defaults to `6379`

hash.description: The fields and values of the Hash.

block.description: `redisdb_hash` manages an individual Hash in redis.

hash.description: The fields and values of the Hash.

block.description: `redisdb_hash` data source can be used to get a map of all the fields and values in a Hash.
